articles.author: Nirupama Subramanian
articles.title: Explained: The Rajapaksa clan in Sri Lanka politics - The Indian Express
articles.description: In South Asia, no other political dynasty has been as confidently nepotistic. During Mahinda Rajapaksa’s second term as President from 2010-15, there were said to be more than 40 Rajapaksa family members in government posts, apart from the cabinet.
articles.content: The Rajapaksa family, whose members include Sri Lankas Prime Minister and President, hails from Hambantota district in the south. President Gotabaya Rajapaksa and his brothers Chamal, PM Mahinda, and… [+3989 chars]

articles.title: The 10 best films of martial arts star Jimmy Wang Yu, who has died aged 79 - South China Morning Post
articles.description: The biggest action star in Asian cinema in the 1960s, Jimmy Wang Yu’s success in films such as One-Armed Swordsman and The Chinese Boxer paved the way for fellow martial arts actors including Bruce Lee.

articles.title: Olivia Rodrigo drops her brand-new Grammy trophy and it breaks into half - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The singer was holding her three trophies and posing for pictures when she dropped one of them.
articles.content:
The incident is reminiscent of the time another famous singer-songwriter, Taylor Swift, dropped and broke one of her trophies at the 2010 Grammys.

articles.description: He called the tune the “essence of processing a breakup and what that is and memories and all of these feelings kind of start flowing".
articles.content:
Shawn Mendes is working through his very public breakup with singer Camila Cabello with his new single, When Youre Gone.
